titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 32: Proverbs 31:20-Job 1:18

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Proverbs XXXI 20 (וידיה שלחה) to the end, including the Masoretic note at the top of fol. 1 recto stating the sum of the verses in Proverbs (915). Continues, with no significant graphic break, Job I 1-18 (יין בבית); the orthography and vocalization occasionally vary from the standard Masoretic text. A text break is signified by open spaces after Job I 5.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 12; ruling method: left rule justified by filler of 1-2 characters from anticipated word, or by stretching last character or the one before it.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
